meanings.definition: The small amount of tobacco left in a pipe after smoking.
meanings.sent1: After smoking his pipe, he carefully emptied the dottle onto the ground.
meanings.sent2: The dottle in the pipe smelled of sweet tobacco.
meanings.sent3: The dottle in the pipe looked like a tiny mountain of ash.
meanings.sent4: The dottle reminded him of the last embers of a campfire.
meanings.sent5: She always saved the dottle to use as compost for her plants.

meanings.definition: To leave a small amount of tobacco in a pipe after smoking.
meanings.sent1: He would dottle his pipe before setting it aside.
meanings.sent2: Don't forget to dottle your pipe before putting it away.
meanings.sent3: He liked to dottle his pipe as a way to savor the flavor.
meanings.sent4: She would often dottle her pipe while lost in thought.
meanings.sent5: Dottling his pipe became a relaxing end to his day.
